Package rl.photoviewer.view

Contains classes to create the view component of the photo viewer.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Commands
    Defines constants for action commands.
    ControlPanel
    Panel with Buttons to control navigation, slide show, full-screen mode etc.
    HelpDialog
    Shows a help dialog with version information, feature list, and some advises for users which are new to the software.
    ImagePanel
    Simple panel showing an image.
    KeywordSelectionPanel  
    MapImagePanel  
    MetadataPanel  
    PVView
    Defines the main frame of the photo viewer application.
    StatusPanel
    A label to display status information.

Package rl.photoviewer.view Description

Contains classes to create the view component of the photo viewer. The main class is PVView. It defines the root object in the view and assembles the complete object structure of the view. All buttons and menu items use command strings defined in Commands as action commands to indicate their intend to the controller. The StatusPanel is responsible for error handling.
Author:
Ruediger Lunde
